detectors.description:
Math.sub(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Baroin.sol#17-20) has assert violation
	Assert violations:
	- assert(bool)(b <= a) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Baroin.sol#18)
Baroin.constructor(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Baroin.sol#130-133) ignores return value by initSetting(company,totalSupply_) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Baroin.sol#132)
Baroin.withdrawTokens(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Baroin.sol#135-138) ignores return value by tc.transfer(owner_,tc.balanceOf(this)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Baroin.sol#137)

Baroin.initSetting(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Baroin.sol#140-144) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances_[addr] = amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Baroin.sol#141)
detectors.markdown:
[Baroin.initSetting(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Baroin.sol#L140-L144) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- [balances_[addr] = amount](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Baroin.sol#L141)

detectors.description:

	- ERC20Token.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Baroin.sol#89-99)

Math.div(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Baroin.sol#12-15) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- c = a / b (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Baroin.sol#13)
